title: Pinky and the Brain
summary: Pinky and the Brain  is an American animated television series that was created by Tom Ruegger that premiered on  Kids' WB on September 9, 1995. It was the first animated television series to be presented in Dolby Surround and the fourth collaboration of Steven Spielberg with his production company, Amblin Entertainment, and Warner Bros. Animation. The characters first appeared in 1993 as a recurring skit on Animaniacs. It was later spun off as a series due to its popularity, with 66 episodes produced. The characters later appeared in the series Pinky, Elmyra & the Brain,[2] and have since returned to their roots as an Animaniacs skit in the 2020 revival of that series.
